That all changes when tightly wound Captain Ray Holt takes over, determined to make the dysfunctional squad into the best in the borough. Pilot episode of the American comedy, starring Andy Samberg and Andre Braugher.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake is assigned to a minor graffiti case by Captain Holt as punishment for turning up late for work, but the investigation becomes a major headache when the vandal's identity is revealed. Meanwhile, Gina's psychic friend Carlene visits the precinct to help with a case, and upsets Charles with a prediction about his romantic life. American comedy, starring Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Peralta, Boyle and Gina get involved in a Die Hard-type hostage situation while doing some off-duty shopping on Christmas Eve, so Jeffords is forced to leave his family celebration to try to save his squad. Santiago attempts to prove that she's just as tough as Captain Holt and Diaz. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Boyle enlists Peralta's help in tracking down his son's favourite toy for Christmas, but they find themselves accidentally facing off against a Latvian crime ring as a result. Back at the precinct, the team members get ready for the annual Christmas carol competition against their rivals at the Metropolitan Transit Authority. Mary Lynn Rajskub guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos, including cats `singing' the Star Wars theme tune and an escaped honey badger.(n)

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos, plus interviews with the people who created them, featuring a giant rat that stops the traffic in Chicago, and a Cambodian sea monster.(n)

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Three couple from Plymouth compete for the £1,000 cash prize. On the first night, beauty therapist Christine and fiance Kevin surprise their guests, while the second day sees young married couple Harvey and Natasha opt for a Spanish theme. Estate agent Paul and his wife Jo try to pull off an ambitious menu for the final meal of the week, but Paul must keep his nerves at bay as the pressure mounts.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: For the first time in his career, Jake has a growing number of cases he just can't seem to solve, and the other detectives worry his run of bad luck will rub off on them. Holt asks Amy to take charge of a community outreach programme for at-risk youths, and Boyle helps Jeffords with a tough personal assignment. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg and Andre Braugher.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake meets an attractive medical examiner at a crime scene, but annoys his colleagues when his attempts to get together with her cause a hold-up with an autopsy report. Meanwhile, Amy discovers Jeffords has some hidden talents when the police sketch artist goes off sick.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard, Penny and Raj settle into their new living arrangement, but Penny and Raj get along so well together that Leonard starts to feel left out. Sheldon expresses an interest in Amy's work and they begin to collaborate on a scientific project.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon pushes himself to the limit when he collaborates on two scientific projects - one with Leonard and Howard, plus another with Amy - on the same day. Bernadette nears the end of her maternity leave, and looks forward to returning to work.(n)

programme.title: Parental Guidance
programme.desc: A busy mother turns to her parents for help in looking after her three children while she and her husband are working. However, family relations are soon strained to breaking point when it becomes clear that the two generations have very different ideas about childcare. Comedy, with Billy Crystal, Bette Midler and Marisa Tomei.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: The Gang's Best Bits: The Bachelor Party Corrosion
programme.desc: The guys' science skills are put to the test when they get a flat tyre during Leonard's surprise bachelor party weekend in Mexico. Meanwhile, the girls finally force Penny to break the news to her family that she has eloped with Leonard. Keith Carradine guest stars.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: The Gang's Best Bits: The 2003 Approximation
programme.desc: Penny and Leonard announce that they are moving in together, prompting Sheldon to revisit 2003, a much simpler time before he had met either of them. Howard and Raj form a band to play at the comic-book store, only to fall out over musical differences.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: The Gang's Best Bits: The Helium Insufficiency
programme.desc: In the middle of a nationwide shortage of liquid helium, Sheldon and Leonard take desperate measures to obtain the supplies they need in order to prove a scientific theory before a rival team of researchers can beat them to it. Meanwhile, Penny and Bernadette download a dating app onto Amy's phone in order to find her a new boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: The Gang's Best Bits: The Positive Negative Reaction
programme.desc: When the gang members find out about Bernadette's big news, they celebrate by getting together for an evening of karaoke. However, Bernadette is upset when Howard freaks out over her announcement as he becomes convinced that he needs to start earning more money. Comedy, Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: The Gang's Best Bits: The Big Bear Precipitation
programme.desc: On a weekend cabin trip with Penny and Amy, Sheldon spills one of Leonard's secrets, while Howard and Bernadette must draw a line when Raj goes overboard with pregnancy gifts. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: The Gang's Best Bits: The Foetal Kick Catalyst
programme.desc: Penny discovers she has a dedicated group of fans from her Serial Ape-ist days when she accompanies Leonard to a comic-con. Meanwhile, Sheldon and Amy host a brunch at Penny's flat, and stress over the baby's arrival prompts Howard to make an impulsive purchase.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: The Gang's Best Bits: The Allowance Evaporation
programme.desc: Amy is furious when she learns that Sheldon has shared intimate details of their relationship with his colleagues at the university, prompting their first fight since moving in together. Raj considers trying to live without financial support from his father, who thinks he is spoilt.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: The Gang's Best Bits: The Long Distance Dissonance
programme.desc: The gang become concerned when Sheldon's former admirer, Dr Ramona Nowitzki, resurfaces while Amy is away working at Princeton University. Jim Parsons stars.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: The Gang's Best Bits: The Proposal Proposal
programme.desc: Amy must decide whether or not to marry Sheldon and gives him an answer to his proposal. Howard and Bernadette struggle with some unexpected news. With guest stars Laurie Metcalf, Riki Lindhome and Stephen Hawking.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.sub-title: The Big Bang Theory: The Gang's Best Bits: The Bow Tie Asymmetry
programme.desc: Friends and family gather as Amy and Sheldon prepare to tie the knot - but it seems the happy couple's minds are elsewhere. Sheldon Cooper and Mayim Bialik star, with guest appearances from Laurie Metcalf, Kathy Bates, Mark Hamill, Jerry O'Connell and Teller (the quiet half of US magic duo Penn and Teller).(n)

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: A woman with dreams of becoming a journalist takes a job as assistant to the editor of a prestigious fashion magazine - a position that should guarantee a bright future if she succeeds. Unfortunately, she has just signed up to work for the boss from hell, whose cruel personality and outrageous demands make her life a nightmare. Comedy drama, with Meryl Streep, Anne Hathaway, Stanley Tucci and Emily Blunt.(n)

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: A party of explorers studying the sunken remains of the famous liner meets an elderly woman who was a passenger on the ill-fated maiden voyage. She recounts how she boarded the ship while on the brink of being forced into marriage by her family, and was stopped from killing herself by a penniless artist. She fell in love with her saviour, but the disaster on the horizon meant their time together was doomed to be short. James Cameron's Oscar-winning romantic drama, starring Kate Winslet, Leonardo DiCaprio, Billy Zane, Kathy Bates and Bill Paxton.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy is furious when she learns that Sheldon has shared intimate details of their relationship with his colleagues at the university, prompting their first fight since moving in together. Raj considers trying to live without financial support from his father, who thinks he is spoilt.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Cut off from his father's fortune, Raj struggles to balance his books, so decides to appoint Sheldon to organise his finances and get him out of debt. Penny considers joining the guys at Comic-Con because she thinks Leonard wants her to come along.(n)

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Two more singletons choose a date from a selection of six naked people, who will be revealed to them one body part at a time. Single mum Tracy from Bedfordshire has been out of the dating game since she split with her fiancee three years ago and hopes to find a man who matches her adventurous side, while London sales advisor Matthew, 24, is tired of dating apps and thinks online profiles mean girls never actually see the real him. Anna Richardson hosts.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy panel show's version of the words-and-numbers quiz, as guest captain Jason Manford and Joe Wilkinson take on guest captain Lee Mack and Fay Ripley. Alex Horne and the Horne Section join Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while Rachel Riley takes care of the letters and numbers.

programme.title: Ricky Gervais: Politics
programme.desc: Stand-up comedian and actor Ricky Gervais performs his second live show, featuring behind-the-scenes footage from his sell-out UK tour.

programme.title: Father Ted
programme.desc: The cleric tries to nurture Chris, the hot favourite to win the King of the Sheep festival, back to top form after he is left shaken by a terrifying encounter. Meanwhile, Dougal becomes convinced Craggy Island is being terrorised by a monster.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Tony and Lisa Meredith have aspired to own a holiday home in South Tenerife for years, and are ready to pursue their dream now that their children have left home. Jasmine Harman helps them navigate the local property market and shows them an apartment with amazing views for almost £20,000 under their £100,000 budget.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Reg and Aby Solomon from Hertfordshire look to buy a family holiday home near the Spanish town of Denia on the popular Costa Blanca. Laura Hamilton searches every nook and cranny of the local market in an attempt to find properties that match the couple's £200,000 budget, but it remains to be seen whether she can deliver the perfect place in the perfect location.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Tracey and Gareth Sadd love the northern part of Tenerife and are keen to find a bolt-hole that they can escape to regularly. Presenter Jasmine Harman searches the local market to find properties to match the couple's £110,000 budget in the hope that they'll like one of them enough to make an offer.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contest begins at Wizards Thatch in Alderley Edge, a village in Cheshire. Owners Ian Lambert and his partner Ali Imiolek hope to cast a spell over the competition, but their guests end up picking out problems with the continental breakfast basket.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition moves to Blackpool, where James Reay and Simon Dooley run the one-star Winterbourne Hotel and Theatre Showbar. The contestants seem to be relaxed and impressed, but a rival's feedback sends one of the hosts storming out of the room.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Perfectionist Andrea Hickmott and her partner Nick Bonner-Williams welcome their guests to Northrise Lodge in Hastings, East Susses, but the rooms are criticised and deemed too clinical to relax in. Andrea also panics when she forgets to put sugar on the tables at breakfast.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Stephanie and Dominic Parker (who would go on to find fame in Gogglebox) welcome the rest of the contestants to their B&B, the Salutation in Sandwich, Kent. However, an alcohol-fuelled evening of parlour games jeopardises the hosts' chances to win the prize.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The contestants meet one last time to discover how much they have been paid by their fellow hoteliers and to air their grievances. A wedding proposal appears to be on the cards, and the winner is announced.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Anthropologist Linda Shanson kicks off the competition in London by capitalising on her well-travelled past with a menu of 16 dishes from around the world. Her relaxed attitude soon causes her to fall behind schedule, and matters are not helped by one guest's perfectionist nature and another's allergy to prawns.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The second meal takes place in London, with fishmonger Jonathan Norris preparing a main course of turbot. However, his inexperience in making desserts and lack of knowledge concerning wines threatens his chances of impressing the other competitors.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Opera singer Patricia Varley rustles up a retro repast of dinner-party dishes from the 1970s in the hope of persuading her guests that classics are better than nouvelle cuisine. The 70-year-old serenades the bemused group with I Could Have Danced All Night before the main course is put to the test.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Estate agent John Santamaria hosts the fourth party in London, and tries to impress his guests with a fillet of beef cooked to their individual tastes. However, nerves threaten to get the better of him when the big day arrives, and prior grievances with fellow contestants Jonathan Norris and Richard Whitaker make matters worse.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Architect, surveyor and property developer Richard Whitaker hosts the final meal in London, convinced his restaurant-style modern recipes will put all the other contestants in the shade. However, his obsession with tidiness threatens to overshadow his culinary efforts.

programme.title: Big Ben: Saving the World's Most Famous Clock
programme.desc: Documentary about restoration work on the iconic clock tower, which will see the bells silenced for the next four years. Anna Keay, Director of Landmark Trust, goes behind the scenes on this massive project, and talks to Parliament's principal architect and the three clockmakers who have the challenging task of taking the gigantic mechanism apart for the first time in nearly 160 years. The programme also examines the history of the clock tower, revealing how it was almost never built in the first place.

programme.title: Big Ben: Saving the World's Most Famous Clock
programme.sub-title: Big Ben: Countdown to New Year: 2018
programme.desc: Anna Keay, Director of the Landmark Trust, presents the second in an occasional series going behind the scenes of the clock tower's ongoing restoration, meeting key personnel working to maintain the iconic tower, clock and the great bell itself. This episode features the foundry owner in Halifax who has been charged with making the new cast ironwork for the clock tower and explores how modern technology is revealing long-buried secrets in the tower's original design - including a mystery at the very pinnacle of the tower.

programme.title: Les Miserables
programme.desc: A former prisoner tries to lead an honest life in post-revolutionary France, despite being pursued everywhere by a fanatical police inspector. He promises a poverty-stricken factory worker that he will raise her child, a relationship that gives his life new meaning, but both of them are drawn into an uprising against the reinstated monarchy. Musical, starring Hugh Jackman, Russell Crowe and Anne Hathaway.

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc: This unique fusion of two popular Channel 4 shows receives a New Year outing as Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy panel show's version of the words-and-numbers quiz, with a Hogmanay flavour. Jon Richardson and Richard Osman take on Johnny Vegas and Sara Pascoe. Meanwhile, David O'Doherty joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner to arbitrate over the players' collective efforts and Rachel Riley looks after the numbers and letters with Joe Wilkinson.

programme.title: Father Ted
programme.desc: Dougal takes over as Craggy Island's new milkman, but his predecessor, local womaniser Pat Mustard, returns to exact an explosive revenge on Ted for getting him sacked. Starring Ardal O'Hanlon and Dermot Morgan.(n)

programme.title: Father Ted
programme.desc: Dougal and Ted visit the mainland, where they bump into actor Richard Wilson - and discover the hard way that he does not take kindly to being confused with his comic alter ego Victor Meldrew. Dermot Morgan and Ardal O'Hanlon star.(n)

programme.title: Father Ted
programme.desc: Key striker Father Jack drinks himself into oblivion just as the Craggy Island clerics are about to play a vital five-a-side football match against their Rugged Island rivals, led by devious Dick Byrne. Dermot Morgan stars.(n)

programme.title: Father Ted
programme.sub-title: Kicking Bishop Brennan Up the A***
programme.desc: Cheating in the football match backfires on Ted, prompting his Rugged Island rivals to think up a devilish forfeit - and leaving the priest trying to contrive a way of kicking Bishop Brennan's backside and getting away with it. Comedy, starring Dermot Morgan and Ardal O'Hanlon.(n)

programme.title: Father Ted
programme.desc: Mrs Doyle wins a competition to meet a famous singer, and discreetly invites him round for tea - but the secret slips out, and soon the house is besieged by hordes of adoring pensioners. Comedy, starring Dermot Morgan, Ardal O'Hanlon and Pauline McLynn.(n)

programme.title: Father Ted
programme.desc: A smooth-talking priest offers Ted a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to leave Craggy Island and run his own parish in Beverly Hills, but first he has to tell Jack, Dougal and Mrs Doyle that they are not invited. Final episode of the clerical comedy, starring Dermot Morgan, with Tommy Tiernan, Jeff Harding and a cameo appearance by music star Brian Eno.(n)

programme.title: Father Ted
programme.desc: The first episode of the hit comedy. The Craggy Island cleric dreams of achieving stardom on the Faith of Our Fathers TV show - but his hopes are dashed by Jack and Dougal's untimely intervention. Dermot Morgan, Ardal O'Hanlon and Frank Kelly star.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Liverpool couple John and Pauline McDonough both have demanding jobs in the pharmaceutical industry and want to find a relaxing bolt-hole to escape to in Spain's Granada province. Laura Hamilton shows them five properties starting at just under £86,000 in the hope that they will make an offer.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jasmine Harman helps married couple Ali and Ben Brown from Kent find their ideal property abroad, as she shows them five places on the Spanish island of Gran Canaria.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: London-based couple Rena Sodhi and Donna Carty want a second home they can escape to in Mojacar, southern Spain. Laura Hamilton finds a townhouse with stunning views for £25,000 less than their budget, but the buyers spot something even more tempting in the presenter's line up of possible purchases.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: In Warwickshire, B&B veteran Paul Workman, who runs Hamlet House in Stratford-upon-Avon, makes the most of his town's Shakespeare connection as another round of the competition gets under way - but his guests cause a fuss when a hair is found in the mushrooms at breakfast.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The competition moves to B&B novices Ben Gray and Katie Keegan's Ashlack business in Cumbria. The guests admire rooms in the estate's 17th-century manor house, but Veronica Pickles and Saida Hammoud are unimpressed when they discover their accommodation is a yurt in the woods. Filled with dread at the idea of a midnight trip to the toilet facilities, they later make plain their feelings when checking out.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The third visit of the week is to the Richwood in Torquay, where partners Veronica Pickles and Saida Hammoud run the 13-bedroom guest house by themselves. The diners are given a crash course in belly-dancing and provided with a feast of Lebanese delicacies - but are soon distracted by the dated decor.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Helen Fraser welcomes her guests to the Tai'r Bull Inn in the Brecon Beacons, with moral support from her friend Kath. Ben and Katie are quick to praise the quality of their lodgings, but B&B veteran Paul spots a few mistakes, while Saida and Veronica refuse to spend the night in their room after they make a discovery.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The four sets of owners meet one last time to discover how much their rivals thought they should receive and to settle some scores. A clash then ensues between two of the week's hosts before the winner of the competition is revealed.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Contestants in Cardiff try to throw the perfect dinner party in a bid to win £1,000. First to take the challenge is Caerphilly businesswoman Suzanne Green, who offers her guests the risky culinary treat of sweetbreads.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The second Cardiff dinner party host is B&B owner Annette Howard, who claims to be psychic. After falling out with Charlie Balch and refusing to touch Suzanne Green's food on day one, she needs all her powers to win round her guests. It does not bode well when her four competitors arrive before she has had the chance to finish the starter, and she forgets the jelly for the trifle. As they sit down to dine - two hours late - the most disconcerting thing is the host's refusal to eat her own cooking.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Former merchant seaman Jim Blythe hopes to spice up the Cardiff diners' week with a meal inspired by his travels. He decides on a Brazilian chicken dish, but waits until the other contestants have started eating before telling them the accompanying vegetables contain cyanide if prepared incorrectly.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Postman Charlie Balch hosts the penultimate dinner party in Cardiff, hoping to impress the contestants with his organic food and smooth out any bad feelings between Annette Howard and Jane Lloyd. For his main course of slow-roasted mutton, Charlie has to drive cross-country to find the piece of meat perfect for the occasion.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Nurse Jane Lloyd prepares roast lamb for her guests in Cardiff. Unfortunately, Annette Howard walks out on the meal before the dessert course, finding the other diners not to her taste and threatening the host's chances of scooping the £1,000 prize money.(n)

programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Pets with problems include a rare breed of bulldog called Cyrus, who has multiple issues, a lame husky named Ghost, and a Maltese-bichon frise cross suffering from seizures. Plus, Bucklersbury Bear, a huge Newfoundland, finds a new lease of life post-surgery - in the water.(n)

programme.title: Guy Martin: Last Flight of the Vulcan Bomber
programme.desc: The mechanic joins a select crew of engineers working to prepare the last Vulcan bomber that is capable of flight for a farewell tour of the UK. The programme features contributions from former crew members, who recall its service in conflicts from the 1950s to the Falklands, as well as serving as Britain's nuclear deterrent.(n)

programme.title: Secret History
programme.sub-title: The Dambusters' Great Escape: Secret History
programme.desc: Dubbed `The Beast' by Winston Churchill, Tirpitz was Nazi Germany's most powerful battleship. Protected by an elite squadron of fighters, it was seen as invincible, but after 34 failed attempts to sink it, the RAF sent in the 617 `Dambusters' Squadron and 9 Squadron. In a raid in November 1944 they managed to slip through enemy defences and destroy Tirpitz. With eyewitness accounts from surviving RAF crew, one of the Luftwaffe fighter pilots and German sailors, this documentary tells this extraordinary story and offers new evidence to explain the mission's improbable success.(n)

programme.title: The Beatles: Eight Days a Week - The Touring Years
programme.desc: Director Ron Howard's documentary charting the period the Beatles spent on the road. Their first gigs with the classic line-up took place around Liverpool in 1961 and their last concert took place in San Francisco in 1966. During that brief span, they helped to forge a global pop culture. This film incorporates restored footage from the live shows, starting in Manchester in 1963, and includes several of the songs in their entirety. Contributors include Paul McCartney, Ringo Starr, Elvis Costello, Richard Curtis, Whoopi Goldberg, Eddie Izzard, Howard Goodall and Malcolm Gladwell.(n)

programme.title: John & Yoko: Above Us Only Sky
programme.desc: The untold story of John Lennon's album Imagine, released in 1971, exploring how the art, politics and music of the pair are intrinsically entwined. Featuring interviews with Yoko Ono, Julian Lennon, David Bailey, John Dunbar), Dan Richter and Eddie Veale, some of whom have never spoken publicly on film before, as well as never-seen-before footage of Lennon and Ono from their private archive.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: Noel, Fielding, Sandi Toksvig, Prue Leith and Paul Hollywood welcome back eight past contestants to compete once more. In this first of two editions, Paul Jagger, Beca Lyne-Pirkis, Selasi Gbormittah and Val Stones face three festive challenges as they compete to win the Christmas Star Baker title.

programme.title: Britain's Wildest Weather
programme.desc: First-hand accounts of extreme weather conditions in the UK in 2018, featuring footage shot by members of the public. The programme showcases the summer heatwave and the record-breaking levels of snowfall reported across the country, as well as wildfires report in both urban and rural areas.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: The restaurant hosts a festive party as maitre d' Fred Sirieix and his Cupids welcome new singletons through the doors as well as a few returning couples to reveal how their lives have changed since their first date. Participants include Tom, 23, who hopes to finally have a girlfriend at Christmas, but says he has `the social etiquette of a four-year-old'. There will also be a live musical performance and a visit from a familiar looking Santa.

programme.title: Big Ben: Saving the World's Most Famous Clock
programme.sub-title: Big Ben: Countdown to New Year: 2018
programme.desc: Anna Keay, Director of the Landmark Trust, presents the second in an occasional series going behind the scenes of the clock tower's ongoing restoration, meeting key personnel working to maintain the iconic tower, clock and the great bell itself. This episode features the foundry owner in Halifax who has been charged with making the new cast ironwork for the clock tower and explores how modern technology is revealing long-buried secrets in the tower's original design - including a mystery at the very pinnacle of the tower.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Burnley, Lancashire, fiercely competitive Jane Dickinson takes on `in it to win it' Mark Dempsey, wedding DJ Kev Riley and cable TV presenter Sally Jaxx, in a week that features a bout of exuberant self-praise, a friendly dog in a stripy jumper and a guest tasting chicken for the first time.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Debt adviser Tom Franklin, landscape architect Richard Hodgetts, housing officer Emma Daisley and recruitment manager Sarah Dix compete for the £1,000 prize in Banbury, Oxfordshire. With single Sarah on the lookout for Mr Right, the week features plenty of flirtatious behaviour, while Richard is branded `Pickie Dickie' for criticising Tom's pea and mint soup.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: In Surrey, American interior designer Carol Chalmers impresses with both her food and presentation, while nail technician Michelle Catacos pulls out all the stops with a Greek banquet - and two consecutive evenings of fine dining leave businessman Robin Lewis feeling the pressure when it's his turn to host. Doctor Anna Brocklebank rounds off the week with some fascinating table talk, but will her menu live up to the conversation?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: A week of competitive dinner parties in Cumbria. Childminder Nina Raistrick kicks off the competition with a menu of deliberately mundane-sounding dishes, followed by theatre manager Jonathan Higgins, who presents a Turkish-themed menu on the second evening. The third night sees council worker Zoltan Buncsek prepare food from his native Hungary, and personal trainer Karen Rathbone rounds off the week with a healthy dinner party.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Homer and Lisa Exchange Cross Words
programme.desc: Lisa learns she is good at crossword puzzles and enters a city-wide contest. Homer opens a break-up service after discovering he has a flair for letting loved ones down, but gets himself into trouble with his daughter when he places a bet against her in the competition.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa takes a trip to the mall to buy a new gadget, while Bart manages to cause chaos. After making a hasty retreat, he befriends a boy named Bashir - but Homer begins to believe that his son's new pal is involved in a terrorist plot.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer is distressed to learn that Lenny and Carl fixed the result of a senior class presidential election, which he lost in high school - leading him to speculate on how his life would have changed for the better had he won the ballot.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Principal Skinner takes the school's underachieving pupils on a trip to ensure they miss a standard test and unexpectedly finds himself rediscovering his enthusiasm for teaching. Paranoia stalks Homer after he forgets to pay the family's insurance bill and leaves him trying to prevent a host of imaginary catastrophes.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer becomes a doting father and decides to spend quality time with his youngest daughter when he discovers Santa's Little Helper knows Maggie better than he does. Meanwhile, a lonely Moe joins an online dating agency, and gets a pleasant surprise when he meets an attractive woman.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Ned Flanders buys the Simpsons' home when they are unable to pay their mortgage and rents it back to them at an affordable rate, but Homer soon takes advantage of his new landlord's generosity.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Lisa has to go undercover as a nun and infiltrate a convent when Maggie goes missing after being left on its doorstep. Meanwhile, Marge is left temporarily blind when she stares at a total eclipse, so Homer has to sort out their rat-infested kitchen.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Grandfather
programme.desc: After ducking out of a bonding session with Grampa, a guilt-ridden Homer vows to make it up to his father by granting him a wish. The old man decides to visit Ireland and drop in on his favourite pub from his army days. Upon arrival, the pair discover the bar is a shadow of its former self, and agree to buy the business and turn its fortunes around.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Ben Hillman sets out to find full-time academic Rosie from Ascot, Berkshire, a property with rental potential on the Croatian island of Hvar for £80,000.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
programme.desc: Lee and Lynn Fox from South Yorkshire have been regular visitors to the Tuscan city of Lucca since Lee's job as a mechanical engineer first took him there over 10 years ago. Lynn's hairdressing business and Lee's job keep the couple very busy, so making the most of their quality time together is key. Laura Hamilton makes it her mission to show them a variety of properties as close to the city centre as possible, on a budget of £170,000.

programme.title: Supershoppers
programme.desc: Anna Richardson and Sabrina Grant offer money-saving tips, and investigate some of the slashed prices and discounts from retailers that may not be all they seem. The team goes undercover at a well-known sofa chain to expose their latest sales tactics, and puts a holiday company's mysterious discounts in the spotlight. There is also a look at how to save money when shopping online and going vegan for January.

programme.title: Travel Man: 48 Hours In
programme.sub-title: Travel Man Christmas Special: 96 Hours in Jordan
programme.desc: Comedian and author David Baddiel joins Richard Ayoade for a seasonal trip to Jordan, visiting world-class wonders, deserts and salted seas. The pair arrive in Amman and explore the city's ancient citadel, before attempting to secure a biblical selection box of gold, frankincense and myrrh, starting with a visit to the gold souk. They also go for a dip in the Dead Sea, follow in the footsteps of Moses as they scale Mount Nebo, and head for the ancient city of Petra, before ending their trip back in Amman, where they learn how to prepare a Jordanian Festive Feast.

programme.title: Britain's Wildest Weather
programme.desc: First-hand accounts of extreme weather conditions in the UK in 2018, featuring footage shot by members of the public. The programme showcases the summer heatwave and the record-breaking levels of snowfall reported across the country, as well as wildfires report in both urban and rural areas.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.sub-title: The Secret Life of the Zoo at Christmas
programme.desc: It's the festive season at Chester Zoo and the keepers are making sure everyone gets a gift, from the meerkats to the miniature monkeys. Christmas comes early with the birth of sun bear cub Kyra, but the new arrival proves a little over-adventurous and gets stuck up a tree. There's a yuletide ceasefire in the long turf war between the otters and the babirusas, the vets have terrible news about golden-headed tamarind Pru, and plucky spider Winston attempts to snag man-eater Ruby.

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.sub-title: The Secret Life of the Zoo at Christmas
programme.desc: Chester Zoo's keepers are busy making gifts for all the animals, but with chimp leader Dylan otherwise occupied by female attention, it is a chaotic free-for-all when the festive parcels are handed over to the chimps. Meanwhile, rhino couple Beni and Asha are experiencing family dysfunction, and when Asha ignores Beni, he is left to find solace in the company of a deer. Elsewhere, The zoo's new thousand-strong family of leaf cutter ants work together to build a new home for themselves out of their Christmas bounty.

programme.title: The Big Fat Quiz of the Year 2018
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts a comedy quiz looking back at the past 12 months, with well-known panellists Richard Ayoade, Noel Fielding, Mo Gilligan, David Mitchell, Claudia Winkleman and Michelle Wolf being put to the test on subjects ranging from politics to pop culture, and sport to science. Special guests including Jon Snow, Charles Dance and pupils from Mitchell Brook Primary School are on hand to set the questions to recall some of the year's biggest events.(n)

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.sub-title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown Christmas Special
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the comedy panel show's version of the words and numbers quiz, with Sean Lock and Kathy Burke teaming up against Jon Richardson and David Mitchell. James Acaster joins Countdown's resident lexicographer Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner, while maths whizz Rachel Riley and comedian Joe Wilkinson are in charge of the numbers.(n)

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces
programme.desc: Architect George Clarke and master craftsman Will Hardie embark on a road trip to explore the ingenious small-space wonders hidden away among the snowy peaks of the Swiss, French and Italian Alps. They start out from an observation point 4,000 metres above sea level, then take in a secret ski lodge disguised as a boulder, a treehouse resembling a giant acorn and a Swiss cabin made almost entirely from concrete. Other highlights include a hamlet made from eight 200-year-old chalets collected from all over the Alps and a mountaintop restaurant resembling a spaceship.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Salon owner Hannah hosts the first of a week of dinner parties in Devon, hoping to impress her guests with a menu bursting with taste sensations.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: The second dinner party in Devon is hosted by funeral director and BMX fanatic Simon, who hopes his big portions and `man food' will win him the cash prize at the end of the week.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Body artist Pascale hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in Devon, preparing a Vietnamese menu full of flavour and colour in an effort to impress her guests enough to win the £1,000 prize money. However, her cooking attire for the starter leaves little to the imagination, Nick and Simon find some unusual artwork in her bedroom, Hannah discovers an unwanted guest in her main course, and Nick hits a nerve with Ajay.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Nick hosts the fourth night in Devon, preparing a menu that he hopes represents his personality - big, bold and brash - although after his argument with Ajay, he is planning on turning down the banter. However, salon owner Hannah is not impressed with Nick's venison main and ladybird-loving Pascale finds the portions a bit too big. But undertaker Simon is happy to polish off any leftovers - is Nick in with a chance of bagging the £1,000 prize?(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Estate agent Ajay hopes her nautical-themed evening will see her sail to victory on the fifth and final night in Devon. Along with a gigantic seafood spread, she has also laid on a boat trip around Torquay harbour. However, all does not go quite to plan in the galley. The guests later gather to discover who has won the £1,000 prize.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Performing arts teacher Helen hosts the first dinner party in Sheffield, but her flamboyant cooking does not go to according to plan.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Design and technology teacher Claire hosts the second day of the competition in Sheffield, and hopes her Asian-inspired menu with a spot of clay model-making will impress her fellow diners enough to net her the points she'll need to secure the cash prize. However, former chef Simon Hollings proves difficult to faze, and the eccentric Helen irritates the other contestants with another audacious display at the dinner table.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Service administrator Monika hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in Sheffield. She treats her guests to a traditional Bulgarian night inspired by her homeland, in the hope of impressing them enough to win the £1,000 prize money. However, some of the guests are unsure about her Bulgarian delicacies, and the host must fight for control when the two teachers go head-to-head and when Simon makes sexist jokes.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Day four in Sheffield sees musician Ivor's turn to host, and he is determined to make it a fun evening with a menu inspired by 1980s pop and a performance by his new romantic band.(n)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Former chef Simon hosts the final meal in Sheffield, but is unlikely to get an easy ride from his guests following all the criticism he has dished out at the earlier soirees. He also has to contend with the feud that's brewing between Claire and Helen, and when things boil over between the women, Monika doesn't know where to hide.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer proposes to Marge for the second time when he discovers their marriage licence is invalid, but the ceremony does not proceed without a hitch. With the voices of Dan Castellaneta and Julie Kavner.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: The Good, the Sad and the Drugly
programme.desc: Bart is on his best behaviour as he tries to win the affections of a girl at his school, while Lisa reports on what Springfield will look like in 50 years. With the voice of Anne Hathaway (Les Miserables).(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer is forced to eat bland food after he burns his taste buds while trying to copy a fire-eating street performer. He becomes a regular at Springfield Elementary's canteen where he learns a new parenting technique to try out on Bart and Lisa - but its overbearing nature leads to disaster. Meanwhile, Marge enjoys a sauna she discovers in the basement.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge and Homer rent an apartment in an affluent area so their children can have a good education when Springfield Elementary is rated the worst school in the state. Bart wastes no time in establishing a bad-boy persona, and increases Lisa's popularity by telling people she knows a pop star. With the voice of Ellen Page (Juno).(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: A property expert offers advice on buying a second home abroad.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun
programme.desc: Jonnie Irwin helps Gary and Susie, who want to start a new adventure in Florida's beautiful Sarasota Keys. Jonnie shows them how far their budget will stretch in this highly desirable corner of the US.(n)

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Winter Sun

programme.title: George Clarke's Amazing Spaces

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau

programme.desc: At the end of a busy year at Chateau de la Motte-Husson, Dick and Angel throw a Christmas party for everyone who helped them in restoring the property to its current glory. The festive menu includes produce from their own walled garden, as well as homemade wines, and the couple also put up a Christmas tree which, as usual, is on a spectacular scale. Last in the series.(n)

programme.desc: Gunny sets out to bring back a Korean War hero accused of desertion - only to encounter a group of locals who have their own plans for the fugitive. Drama, starring Randy Vasquez and David James Elliott.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.desc: Mark and Amanda join Steve in a bid to prove an ambitious figure skater hired her former coach to murder a professional rival. Mystery, starring Dick Van Dyke.(n)

programme.title: Diagnosis Murder
programme.sub-title: X Marks the Murder - Part One
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mark tries to catch the Casanova Killer, and loses his impartial view of the case when the murderer calls him. Medical detective drama, starring Dick Van Dyke.(n)

programme.title: Walker, Texas Ranger
programme.desc: Trivette and Walker are reluctant to allow a police show to film them in action - until a beautiful television reporter appears.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A doctor dies on board the USS Borealis during a heavy storm and when the ship is brought into Norfolk Naval Yard, Ducky's investigation reveals a telltale mark on the victim's carotid artery, suggesting he was injected with poison. Initial inquiries focus on a petty officer with a history of drug use who may have wanted the doctor to remain silent about his problems. American drama, starring David McCallum.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The team is forced to establish whether the gunning down of a man outside the Vietnamese Consulate is an isolated incident or a terrorist attack, facing a race against time to ensure the safety of delegates at an upcoming international conference. Crime drama, guest starring Dan Lauria (The Wonder Years).(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team investigates the disappearance of photographer Martin Roe, who was due to testify at an army first lieutenant's court-martial after he captured a picture of what appeared to be a soldier killing an unarmed civilian. However, the photograph is leaked, and Roe is later found dead with a needle in his arm.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A daredevil driver is decapitated while performing a stunt at a street party, bringing the festivities to a premature end. Realising the incident was murder rather than an accident, the team focuses the investigation on a bystander whose expertise with remote-controlled cars makes him a likely suspect. David Caruso, Emily Procter and Adam Rodriguez star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A DNA assessment of a kidnapping crime scene reveals horrifying results for Natalia, who discovers her sister Anya is one of a number of missing women. Racing to track her down, the team finds a collection of photographs that may hold the key to breaking the case. Starring David Caruso, Eva La Rue and Adam Rodriguez.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A woman is killed shortly after participating in a charity event, and it emerges that she had tried to reveal the involvement of its hosts with terrorists. As the team delves deeper into her mysterious world, a plot is uncovered that could put the entire city in danger. Starring David Caruso.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: A marine recruiter is found dead on a civilian shooting range - but there is no blood at the crime scene and evidence suggests he died elsewhere. Horatio uncovers evidence suggesting the killing could be linked to the death of a soldier during combat in Iraq, prompting a second homicide investigation to be launched. Crime drama, starring David Caruso and Emily Procter.(n)

programme.title: ER
programme.desc: Greene shows signs of losing his grip on reality and Hathaway's clinic receives a much-needed financial boost courtesy of Carter's grandmother. Family trauma knocks Ross for six and Weaver makes a dramatic decision. Hospital drama, starring Anthony Edwards, Julianna Margulies and George Clooney.(n)

programme.title: Medium
programme.desc: Allison has dreams about a boy kidnapped from a toy shop, but since her abilities have been revealed to the public she cannot go to Devalos or Scanlon. Instead she phones an investigation company hired by the child's family to look for him - and is introduced to their employee Cynthia Keener. With guest star Anjelica Huston, alongside Patricia Arquette.(n)

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Natalia is arrested for the murder of her abusive ex-husband Nick Townsend, but the team is sidelined from the investigation by Internal Affairs, leaving it up to Horatio and Calleigh to prove her innocence. In a separate investigation, a wealthy single man is found dead in his mansion - and subsequent developments reveal the two cases are related.(n)

programme.title: The Love Boat
programme.desc: American sitcom set aboard the Pacific Princess, a luxury cruise ship catering for a decidedly mixed clientele. Starring Gavin MacLeod, Lauren Tewes and Bernie Kopell.(n)

programme.title: House At The End Of The Street (?)
Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A wealthy philanthropist who was accused of rape and kidnap is killed. A former supermodel whose daughter was attacked is blamed for the murder - but Benson is alarmed to find herself implicated by the defendant's wily attorney. Jacqueline Bisset guest stars alongside Mariska Hargitay.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The discovery of a child's body sends Stabler and Cragen in search of a suspected paedophile, but important medical evidence emerges that implicates someone close to the child. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Dann Florek.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A wealthy woman is found dead in her apartment, but Lupo and Bernard are quick to dismiss the theory that the killer sought her money. Evidence suggests she was mixing with dangerous figures, among them a cartel, after suitcases filled with cash and drugs are found in the victim's portfolio of properties.

programme.title: Catch a Contractor
programme.desc: Adam Carolla goes on the trail of a contractor who was hired to create a half bath, laundry room and chicken coop, but fled the project, leaving a trail of excuses.

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: CSI: Miami
programme.desc: Horatio investigates the murder of a probation officer and is shocked to discover that DNA evidence suggests the killer is connected to him. Yelina takes up the case, and it emerges drugs are at the heart of the crime. Meanwhile, Eric is upset at Calleigh's new relationship with Jake Berkeley. Drama, starring David Caruso and Sofia Milos.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A security guard is found dead in the back of an armoured car and Sid discovers the victim's pacemaker exploded owing to a blast of microwave energy that also knocked out the area's CCTV cameras. At first the investigators blame the freak incident on the Empire State Building's antennae, but as events unfold, they begin to suspect the work of an ex-convict linked to an experimental weapon.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The owner of an electronic-recycling company is targeted by eco-terrorists who park a truck rigged with explosives outside his Manhattan home - but his daughter becomes the unintended victim of the blast. Meanwhile, Danny and Lindsay reach a crossroads in their relationship. Drama, starring Gary Sinise, Carmine Giovinazzo and Anna Belknap.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and Stella investigate the shooting of a Native American chief on the subway, and soon put two people in the frame - a company owner and an Irish hurling team captain who were engaged in a fierce land dispute with the victim. However, a member of the dead man's tribe is soon suspected of the murder. Starring Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A voice coach is murdered in a theatre and as the ensuing investigation gathers pace, Stella is given cause to believe someone is playing the CSIs at their own game. Flack checks the victim's criminal record and discovers he had been in trouble for stalking, turning the spotlight on one of the women he harassed. Guest starring singer Katharine McPhee, with Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Feature-length episode. First lieutenant Michael Torres gets involved in a fight before falling to the ground, and is found beaten to death the next morning. The only witness is his friend and colleague Captain Joe Westcott, who suffers from post-traumatic stress disorder and has trouble distinguishing reality from his past military experiences in the Middle East.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The aftermath of Harper Dearing's bomb attack on the NCIS headquarters dominates proceedings. As rescue crews sift through the debris searching for survivors, Abby, Gibbs, McGee and Vance are accounted for, but Ziva and Tony are trapped in a lift. Dearing makes contact after his ex-wife is taken into custody, enabling his car to be traced to an abandoned lot - and the agents arrive just in time to see the vehicle blow up. Starring Mark Harmon, Michael Weatherly and Pauley Perrette.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs and the team investigate the death of an armoury employee when divers find her body in a car at the bottom of a lake. The victim had been reported missing since she was evacuated before the blast at NCIS headquarters. Meanwhile, crisis counsellor Miles Wolf carries out psychological assessments of all the agents in the wake of the bombings. Guest starring Steve Valentine (Crossing Jordan).

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: While on medical leave, Ducky reopens a 12-year-old case by talking officials at a cemetery into releasing the body of a navy commander whose post-mortem he carried out 12 years previously. Meanwhile, the team is called in to investigate the death of a sergeant from carbon monoxide poisoning - and finds a copy of Ducky's exhumation request on the man's laptop. Crime drama, starring David McCallum.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate when three dehydrated survivors from a helicopter crash are discovered. The pilot is initially missing, but his body later washes ashore with a gunshot wound to the head. Things get complicated when one of the crew members tells the agents the chopper was hit by another aircraft, while another states that the pilot tried to kill them all by crashing into the sea on purpose. American drama, starring Mark Harmon and David McCallum.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The driver of a Ferrari is gunned down by a motorcyclist and the victim is identified as petty officer Colin Boxer, who was holding down a second job as a valet parker and had borrowed the sports car. The owner of the vehicle turns out to be Vijay Chaya, the billionaire head of a large corporation, and the team suspects a case of mistaken identity. During the course of the investigation, Gibbs chances on a medal awarded to Leroy Jethro Moore, the man he was named after and an estranged friend of his father. Guest starring Billy Dee Williams (The Empire Strikes Back) and Ralph Waite (The Waltons).

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part one of two. First lieutenant Michael Torres gets involved in a fight before falling to the ground, and is found beaten to death the next morning. The only witness is his friend and colleague Captain Joe Westcott, who suffers from post-traumatic stress disorder and has trouble distinguishing reality from his past military experiences in the Middle East.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Feature-length special. A man and his son on a fishing trip hook what appears to be the body of a petty officer, but the dead man turns out to be a journalist who had been investigating the proliferation of drugs in the Navy. Meanwhile, Ziva returns to her car after a workout at the gym to find her father Eli hiding inside. Guest starring Michael Nouri.

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: The body of a female jogger is found in a park, and detectives Briscoe and Green discover she was mauled to death by a pit-bull terrier. The race is on to trace the animal and its owner before another tragedy occurs - and the team is shocked to discover a warehouse where dogs are trained for illegal fighting. Police drama, starring Jerry Orbach.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The discovery of an African boy's dismembered body leads the detectives to suspect he was killed by cultists as a ritual sacrifice - but subsequent investigations implicate a slave-trading ring operating from Nigeria. Hard-hitting drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team believe they have finally identified the Taxicab Killer and move in to make an arrest - but on arriving to apprehend their suspect, they discover he too is dead. While they are pondering their next move, the real murderer kidnaps Reed - and forces him to blog about yet another gruesome crime.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac and the team investigate the murder of an eminent archaeologist who has been shot dead in an alleyway. Tracing the evidence to a local tramp, they find him in possession of a stolen pocket watch linked to a missing persons case from the 1930s, and a pendant that provides a clue to a possible smuggling ring. Drama, starring Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac discovers the victims of three seemingly unrelated killings, which took place simultaneously at locations around the city, had one very significant thing in common - they were all about to go to trial for murder, and had agreed to provide evidence against a drug dealer in exchange for reduced sentences. Drama, starring Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes.

programme.title: Catch a Contractor
programme.desc: Valerie wanted to build an art studio in her garage as a memorial to her late husband, but the contractor she hired turned out to be unlicensed and it showed in his work. Adam Carolla and Skip quickly realise the work he did needs to be torn down, and the team tries to pin down the slippery and seemingly unrepentant tradesman.

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance to buy goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.

programme.title: Catch a Contractor
programme.desc: Adam Carolla sets out to seek justice for the Floyds, whose Los Angeles home had been abandoned by the contractors they had hired to make improvements, leaving the couple and their 15-month-old baby in danger. However, as Adam sets out to ambush the tradesmen who failed to baby-proof the property, the tale takes a sudden and entirely unexpected twist.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Media mogul Robert Dunbrook is suspected of murder, but claims he was acting in self-defence - and matters are complicated by the disappearance of the alleged victim's body. As inquiries continue, Mac discovers that the case is connected to an earlier investigation. Guest starring Craig T Nelson, with Gary Sinise and Melina Kanakaredes.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac reopens inquiries into the death of a cyclist, determined to find out why an innocent man willingly served an 18-month jail sentence for vehicular manslaughter. Meanwhile, Lindsay goes into labour and rushes to the hospital, where she is joined by a nervous Danny, and later gives birth to a girl. Gary Sinise and Anna Belknap star.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: One of the team is gunned down when media mogul Robert Dunbrook's son is kidnapped on the way to testify against his father in court. Desperate for justice for their fallen comrade, Mac, Stella and Flack investigate Dunbrook and his son's abductors, but risk putting more lives in jeopardy. Guest starring Nelly and Craig T Nelson, with Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes and Eddie Cahill.

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The badly decomposed bodies of two scuba divers are found in New York's East River and Hawkes surmises the deaths were caused by asphyxiation. However, Mac wonders how they could have drowned with full tanks of oxygen still attached and orders lab tests - which confirm the deaths were no accident. With Gary Sinise, Melina Kanakaredes and Carmine Giovinazzo.

programme.title: Columbo: A Bird in the Hand
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with a mountain of debts comes up with a plan to make some easy money. He plants a bomb under his wealthy uncle's car in the hope of inheriting a large legacy - but a hit-and-run driver jeopardises the entire scheme and Columbo is soon sniffing around for clues. Detective drama, starring Peter Falk, Tyne Daly, Greg Evigan and Don S Davis.

programme.title: Columbo: Lady in Waiting
programme.desc: A desperate woman is determined to rid herself of her domineering brother and gain control of the family business, so hatches a plan to shoot him and claim she thought he was a burglar. Although her plan seems to have worked, her new-found power goes to her head - and she also has to contend with Columbo, who is convinced of her guilt. Crime drama, starring Peter Falk, Leslie Nielsen and Susan Clark.

programme.title: Columbo: Butterfly in Shades of Grey
programme.desc: A radio presenter is plotting to sabotage his adopted daughter's plans to publish her first novel and kills one of his employees for trying to help her. He thinks he has the perfect alibi, claiming that the victim was murdered while they were talking to each other on the phone, and there is a tape recording to prove it - but his ruse fails to fool the dishevelled detective. Crime drama, with Peter Falk, William Shatner and Molly Hagan.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Crooked House
programme.desc: Adaptation of the mystery novel, starring Max Irons and Terence Stamp. Charles, the son of the assistant commissioner at Scotland Yard returns to London from Cairo following the end of the Second World War, only to discover his fiancee's grandfather has been murdered. He uses his father's connections to become involved in the investigation, and finds the dead man's second wife a likely suspect. However, nobody in the household has an alibi, and Charles' fiancee may have the clearest motive for murder. With Gillian Anderson and Glenn Close.

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.

programme.title: Agatha Christie's Crooked House
programme.desc: Adaptation of the mystery novel, starring Max Irons and Terence Stamp. Charles, the son of the assistant commissioner at Scotland Yard returns to London from Cairo following the end of the Second World War, only to discover his fiancee's grandfather has been murdered. He uses his father's connections to become involved in the investigation, and finds the dead man's second wife a likely suspect. However, nobody in the household has an alibi, and Charles' fiancee may have the clearest motive for murder. With Gillian Anderson and Glenn Close.

programme.title: Agatha & the Truth of Murder
programme.desc: On January 12, 1920, Florence Nightingale Shore - a nurse and god-daughter of Florence Nightingale - is found brutally beaten on a train, dying four days later due to the extent of her injuries. Driven to distraction by the lack of progress and the failure of the police to catch the killer, Florence's longtime friend Mabel Rogers begins her own investigation and makes an appeal to Agatha Christie for help. Moved by the plea and eager for the chance to escape from professional and personal problems, the writer agrees to try to solve the case. Mystery, starring Ruth Bradley, Pippa Haywood and Tim McInnerny.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A bystander is killed in a robbery, traumatising his mentally ill wife, who is later suspected of physically abusing their child. The police take the youngster into protective custody, but a lack of evidence forces them to return him home - with tragic consequences. Crime drama, starring Christopher Meloni and Mariska Hargitay.

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Beckett and the team investigate the murder of a student learning English as a second language and Castle goes undercover as a French-Canadian immigrant when the victim's classmates refuse to talk to the police.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The partially decomposed body of a teenage girl is discovered inside a crushed car at a scrapyard, and knife marks on her pelvis are found to have been inflicted after her death. The team learns the victim was pregnant when she was killed and realises her unborn child was snatched - and may still be alive.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A scuffle in a bridal shop sale ends in a woman's death - and the detectives realise she was once a victim of a serial rapist who has gone on to murder a subway musician. As they try to find a link between the two women, the case proves troubling for Hawkes, whose former girlfriend was attacked by the same man eight years previously. Hill Harper and Gary Sinise star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The body parts of a murdered high-school wrestling coach are found scattered around the city, and Hawkes discovers he may have been responsible for e-mailing sexually explicit pictures of underage boys. Later evidence suggests two of his athletes could have hacked into his account and sent the images, but they deny killing him. Meanwhile, Flack is accused of using excessive force to subdue a suspect who died in his custody.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: A chance for viewers to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Access
programme.desc: Showbiz news and gossip.(n)

programme.title: Catch a Contractor
programme.desc: The team hunts for unreliable contractor Avi, who was hired to fix a burst sewer pipe but left the job unfinished. Rendered physically sick by the ensuing insect infestation, the homeowners require Adam and Skip to track the man down and force him to address the debacle he created.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The team is called in to investigate the murder of a girl dressed as a character that inhabits virtual world Second Life. It transpires she was tortured before dying and an examination of her computer reveals she was planning to meet an online partner in real life. Furthermore, a doll found next to the body bears a marked resemblance to her date. Starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: A model's body is found in a giant Martini glass high above Times Square, and circumstances initially suggest she was the victim of accidental electrocution - but the real cause of death proves to be far more surprising. Meanwhile, a robbery-homicide at a restaurant turns into a full-blown hostage crisis. Drama, starring Gary Sinise.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: The owner of a property relocation company is found dead in one of his houses and the evidence initially points toward a disgruntled former tenant, but further investigation puts the victim's own family in the frame. Meanwhile, Flack worries about his sister's erratic behaviour. Gary Sinise, Eddie Cahill, Melina Kanakaredes and Carmine Giovinazzo star.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: Mac suspects he could be next on a killer's list of targets after learning two men who share his name have been murdered, and sets about rounding up his other namesakes for questioning. However, evidence from a motorist leads to the realisation that the real target is a particular driver involved in a hit-and-run. Guest starring Julia Ormond, Rumer Willis and rapper Nelly.(n)

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: The gang is recruited by the US government to rescue a general and his daughter kidnapped by guerrillas in Borneo. Action adventure, starring Mr T and George Peppard.(n)

programme.title: The A-Team
programme.desc: Hannibal and the gang intervene to prevent an arranged marriage between a Texan heiress and her father's killer. Action adventure, starring Mr T and George Peppard.(n)

programme.title: CSI: NY
programme.desc: As the search for the taxicab killer continues, Danny, Lindsay and Flack are distracted by the strange case of a man who died shortly after making a $1million shot during half-time at a basketball game. With Melina Kanakaredes and Carmine Giovinazzo.(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: Now engaged, Castle and Beckett each have their own professional concerns to deal with. Becket starts FBI training in Washington, DC and is assigned to a case involving illegal access to a building via stolen codes, while Castle also finds himself in the US capital, where he is exposed to a deadly gas. Crime drama, starring Nathan Fillion and Stana Katic.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green investigate a spate of murders and find a recurring pattern, leading them to believe they have a serial killer on their hands. They soon find a suspect, who admits to killing 15 women - but he then puts a disconcerting spin on things by claiming his attorney knows more about the crimes than they realise.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: Briscoe and Green are called in to investigate the murder of a notorious bounty hunter. Piecing together his final movements, they turn their attentions to a meeting between the victim and an ambitious journalist, which may be able to shed light on what happened.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order
programme.desc: A vial containing a sample of the Sars virus is stolen during a carjacking, leaving Briscoe and Green spearheading a wide-scale hunt for a man dubbed patient zero - the first victim to have contracted the illness. They finally home in on a female reporter who recently ended a long-term relationship with a virologist.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Part two of two. Tony reviews satellite footage of rebel forces in the Middle East and spots Kersey among a group of insurgents, concluding that Joe Westcott's fear of him was well-founded. Back at HQ, Abby creates a 3D computer model of the attack that occurred in Afghanistan and Joe dons a virtual-reality headset to relive the traumatic events. Will it jog his memory?(n)

programme.title: Castle
programme.desc: The author returns to Los Angeles to find out more about the missing time related to his abduction, and The Greatest Detective Society requests his assistance in solving a murder.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The body of a teenage girl is found in the boot of a car, and inquiries soon establish she was a bully who enjoyed picking on other girls - leaving Stabler and Benson with a seemingly endless list of suspects to choose from. Hard-hitting drama, starring Christopher Meloni, Mariska Hargitay and Dann Florek.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a six-year-old boy who is believed to have collapsed during an exorcism at a late-night church service. However, forensics reveal the victim was smothered before the rite took place, casting suspicion on his foster parents and social worker. Starring Christopher Meloni, Ice-T and Richard Belzer.(n)

programme.title: Law & Order: Criminal Intent
programme.sub-title: To the Boy in the Blue Knit Cap
programme.desc: In the last-ever episode of the long-running crime drama, twins Parker and Thomas Gaffney are found dead in the offices of a successful internet dating website. It emerges they believed the company's owner Danielle Magee had stolen their business idea after they employed her as a programmer and had filed a lawsuit against her. Goren attends his final therapy session and finds his future in the force is in question. Vincent D'Onofrio stars.(n)

programme.title: Players of the Faithful
programme.desc: The story of the Offaly team that famously ended Kerry's bid to become the first county to win five All Ireland football titles in a row in 1982. With contributions from the key men involved, it tells the tale of a county that capitalised on high levels of employment for young men in 1980s Ireland to shock Irish sport in the most memorable All Ireland Final.

programme.title: The Butcher Boy
programme.desc: Francie Brady, a boy growing up in a dysfunctional family, finds solace in a fantasy world. He begins to plunge deeper into his delusions, with his behaviour becoming increasingly erratic, until it eventually culminates in the murder of a neighbour. Neil Jordan's black comedy, based on Patrick McCabe's novel, starring Eamonn Owens, Stephen Rea, Milo O'Shea and Sinead O'Connor.

programme.title: Chicago Med
programme.desc: Reese's estranged father is due to receive a heart transplant. Manning and Rhodes clash over how best to handle the parents of a 10-year-old patient.

programme.title: Criminal Minds: Beyond Borders
programme.desc: Jack Garrett and the IRT travel to South Korea to investigate a case in which a US college student is murderered and disfigured, and left in an alley for the authorities to find.

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: The second of a two-part story picks up where things left off last week, with Humphrey, Florence and Dwayne having swapped the sun and sand of the Caribbean for the cold and noise of London. Their latest investigation has taken them back to the detective inspector's home town - but they've hit a brick wall with the discovery of another dead body. And now they have two murders to solve. Meanwhile, Dwayne has an emotional encounter and Humphrey receives advice from an unexpected source that helps him reach a big decision. Crime drama, starring Kris Marshall, Danny John-Jules and Josephine Jobert, with guest appearances from Ardal O'Hanlon and Sally Bretton.

programme.desc: European and international headlines live via satellite.

programme.title: EuroNews
programme.desc: European and international headlines live via satellite.

programme.desc: Buying goods from the comfort of home.

programme.title: Flight of the Doves
programme.desc: Two children run away from their bullying stepdad after the death of their mother, and seek refuge in Ireland with their grandmother. However, their scheming uncle follows them, knowing they are heirs to a fortune he stands to inherit should anything happen to them. Children's drama, starring Ron Moody, Dorothy McGuire, Jack Wild and Helen Raye.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: An orphan wins the fatherly affections of a tough-talking billionaire - but the no-good owner of the orphanage and her brother are out to ruin the girl's chances of happiness and make a quick profit in the process. Musical, directed by John Huston, based on the stage play. Starring Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett and Tim Curry.

programme.title: Great Lighthouses of Ireland
programme.desc: How Ireland became a world leader in lighthouse engineering, featuring a visit to the 200-year-old lighthouse on Tuskar Rock and personal accounts of keepers at Fastnet tower.

programme.title: RTÉ News: One O'Clock and Weather
programme.desc: National and international news.

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Needing to get rid of stolen goods that Kev planted at the Waterhole, Gary mistakenly attacks Dipi in the darkness. Ben contacts Xanthe with a job offer near Toowoomba.

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Earlier events at the Slater house have left the family in shock, leaving those involved struggling to keep their emotions under control and tensions soon reach boiling point. However, just as it looks like the situation is under control, things take an unexpected turn.

programme.title: Fair City
programme.desc: A stressed Orla prepares to undergo fertility treatment, which leads to a mistake involving the garage opening. Mondo misjudges how much Melanie appreciates his support.

programme.title: Porridge
programme.desc: Dick Clement and Ian La Frenais' updated version of their prison comedy, set in the present day. Kevin Bishop plays the grandson of Ronnie Barker's iconic character, who is serving a sentence for cyber crimes - and getting himself into even more trouble while completing his stretch. Ralph Ineson, Mark Bonnar and Dave Hill also star.

programme.title: Phil Lynott: Scealta on Old Town
programme.desc: The story behind the making of the singer's promo video for his song Old Town, which was made exclusively for RTÉ.

programme.title: Goldfinger
programme.desc: James Bond is assigned to investigate a notorious German gold smuggler and discovers his quarry has ambitions much greater than first suspected. Pursuing the criminal mastermind around the world, Bond uncovers the villain's audacious scheme to destroy the global economy with a daring attack on Fort Knox. Spy adventure, starring Sean Connery, Gert Frobe and Honor Blackman.

programme.desc: The latest national and international headlines.

programme.desc: News and music from 1994, the year in which OJ Simpson was arrested following the murder of his ex-wife. Former Russian president Boris Yeltsin failed to get off a plane to greet Irish officials, and reports of injuries during the filming of blockbuster Braveheart surfaced. Including hits by Boyzone, REM, the Cranberries and Crowded House.

programme.desc: A look at how the Pope's two-day trip to Ireland was organised, capturing both the sense of anticipation and trepidation as the day of the big visit nears.

programme.desc: With just 24 hours to go before the wedding, Mel puts the final pieces of her plan into place, and to avoid Ray getting suspicious, she asks Shirley to distract him from coming home. As the new year festivities get under way at the Vic, Louise gets drunk and makes a scene in front of Keanu and Ray. Tiffany tries to make it up to Bernadette after standing her up for Evie.

programme.title: Ireland's Fittest Family
programme.desc: Actress Norma Sheehan, 2FM's Keith Walsh, singers Sean and Conor Price and Dancing with the Stars judge Brian Redmond are joined by their families to battle it out for the title.

programme.title: Mrs Brown's Boys
programme.sub-title: Mrs Brown's Boys New Year Special: Mammy's Motel
programme.desc: The doting mother offers Winnie and Sharon a place to stay when the pipes in their house burst, but Agnes and Cathy soon discover that living with best friends isn't as much fun as they thought it would be. As if that wasn't enough for Agnes to cope with, she is asked by Father Damian to do a eulogy for a neighbour she never knew and there's Bono's 13th birthday party to host as well.
