Romantic musical set in 1950s, starring John Travolta, Olivia Newton-John, Stockard Channing, Jeff Conaway, Didi Conn and Sid Caesar.

programme.title: Mamma Mia
programme.desc: A former member of a singing trio, now running a hotel on a Greek island, is reunited with her old bandmates for her daughter's wedding - but is surprised when three of her old flames also show up unexpectedly. The three men have been invited by the bride, who wants to find out which one of them is her father. Musical comedy, with a soundtrack of Abba songs, starring Meryl Streep, Pierce Brosnan, Julie Walters, Colin Firth, Stellan Skarsgard and Amanda Seyfried.

programme.title: The Greatest Showman
programme.desc: After losing his job as a bank clerk, PT Barnum creates and develops his circus in New York in the mid-1800s with the help of playwright Phillip Carlyle and an adopted family of entertainers shunned by society. Musical drama, starring Hugh Jackman, Zac Efron, Michelle Williams, Rebecca Ferguson and Zendaya.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now-separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices. Comedy sequel, starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Brittany Snow.

programme.title: Hello, Dolly
programme.desc: A widowed matchmaker sets about finding a new wife for a grain merchant whose spouse has died. However, she has secretly fallen in love with the man herself, and hatches an elaborate plan to marry him. Musical set in late 19th-century New York, starring Barbra Streisand, Walter Matthau, Michael Crawford and Marianne McAndrew, and featuring Louis Armstrong's performance of the title number.

programme.title: 30 Days of Night
programme.desc: A horde of vampires finds the perfect hunting ground - a town in Alaska that remains sunless for a month. The local sheriff heads up a small band of townsfolk as they try to avoid the bloodthirsty invaders and survive until the sun rises once again. Horror, with Josh Hartnett, Danny Huston and Melissa George.

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.desc: Comedy about a family of deaf gangsters who protect their interests with their signing hands. When the opera family threaten their dominance a fingerspelling war ensues.

programme.title: The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water
programme.desc: The cheery sea creature tries to prevent a precious secret formula from falling into the wrong hands - but when it goes missing, the end of the world approaches. SpongeBob and his friends embark on a quest to get it back, which leads to them developing superpowers and venturing onto dry land. Animated comedy, with the voices of Tom Kenny and Antonio Banderas.

programme.title: Rio
programme.desc: A domesticated rare bird is taken to Rio de Janeiro to mate with a female, but the pair are stolen by animal smugglers. He ends up lost on the streets of a strange city, and to make it back to his owner, he will have to learn to fly for the first time in his life. Animated comedy, with the voices of Jesse Eisenberg and Anne Hathaway.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about the making of the Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Life for identical twins Jared and Simon and their sister Mallory begins afresh when their mother inherits a spooky mansion. But after moving in, strange things begin to happen, and as the youngsters investigate, they discover a book that opens up a mysterious world of amazing supernatural creatures. Fantasy adventure, starring Freddie Highmore in a dual role alongside Sarah Bolger and Nick Nolte.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies Interview Special
programme.desc: Director Steven Spielberg and stars Tom Hanks and Mark Rylance talk about the making of the Cold War espionage drama.

programme.title: Home Alone
programme.desc: A boy has to fend for himself when he is accidentally left behind after his family jets off to Paris for Christmas. The youngster initially enjoys his freedom, but is soon forced to resort to ingenious booby traps to defend the family home from two dim-witted burglars. Comedy, starring Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern, John Heard, Catherine O'Hara and John Candy.

programme.title: X-Men
programme.desc: Super-powered outsiders Rogue and Wolverine find themselves at a school for mutants which is run by a benevolent psychic professor. While there, they agree to join others with similar gifts to take on a superhuman mutant terrorist faction intent on establishing dominance over mankind. Sci-fi comic-book adventure, starring Hugh Jackman, Patrick Stewart, Ian McKellen, Anna Paquin and Halle Berry.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: Secret agent Ethan Hunt and his team are implicated in a bombing at the Kremlin, forcing the American president to declare them fugitives. The spies plan to clear their name by abducting the real terrorist, which leads them into a pursuit around the globe. However, Hunt cannot be sure his colleagues are trustworthy. Action adventure sequel, starring Tom Cruise, Jeremy Renner, Simon Pegg and Paula Patton.

programme.title: Back to the Future
programme.desc: Teenager Marty McFly travels back to the 1950s in a time machine built by his eccentric inventor friend. The return journey proves tricky enough, but he also accidentally alters the sequence of events that led to his parents falling in love - and has to persuade his future dad to win his mother's heart, or he will never be born. Sci-fi comedy adventure, starring Michael J Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson and Crispin Glover.

programme.title: The Craft
programme.desc: A new girl who finds it difficult to fit in at school befriends three goth misfits, who discover they can perform magic and form a secret coven. They initially use their powers for self-improvement, but eventually start to turn against their classmates, driving the ringleader insane as her lust for power takes over. Horror, starring Robin Tunney, Fairuza Balk, Neve Campbell, Rachel True and Skeet Ulrich.

programme.title: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
programme.desc: A fairy living in a forest encounters a member of a lumber crew and magically shrinks him down to her size. He learns about the damage humans are doing to the area, and helps defend it when his fellow loggers unwittingly unleash an evil spirit that had been entombed in a tree. Animated adventure, with the voices of Robin Williams, Christian Slater and Tim Curry.

programme.title: The Muppet Christmas Carol
programme.desc: An embittered Victorian miser hates the festive season and people in general, but on Christmas Eve, the ghosts of his former business partners, the Marley brothers, visit him in the night. They warn him three spirits are coming to make him change his ways by showing him visions of the past, the present and what the future may hold. Comedy, with Michael Caine and Steven Mackintosh alongside the puppet characters.

programme.title: Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb
programme.desc: Nightwatchman Larry notices that the living exhibits of his museum are behaving strangely. He discovers that the magical artefact that brings them to life is damaged, so he and his friends travel to London's Natural History Museum to find a way to restore it. Fantasy comedy sequel, starring Ben Stiller, Rebel Wilson and Robin Williams in his final film role.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: Time-travelling teenager Marty McFly travels to the 21st century, where he has to save his children from a terrible fate. However, this proves to have unforeseen consequences when the future version of arch enemy Biff sees a chance to rewrite history for his own benefit, leaving Marty stuck in a twisted parallel universe. Sci-fi comedy sequel, starring Michael J Fox and Christopher Lloyd.

programme.title: Snow White & the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen learns that her reign will last for ever if she kills a princess, so sends a renowned warrior to find and murder her. However, he comes to realise his mistress's evil ways, and instead trains his intended victim to fight so they can bring the tyrant's rule to an end. Fantasy adventure, with Kristen Stewart, Chris Hemsworth and Charlize Theron.

programme.title: The Favourite Interview Special
programme.desc: Stars Emma Stone, Olivia Colman and Rachel Weisz and director Yorgos Lanthimos talk about making the period comedy drama, set in the early 18th century in the court of Queen Anne.

programme.title: Bridge of Spies
programme.desc: A lawyer in 1950s New York is hired to represent a Soviet spy in a showcase trial designed to demonstrate the fairness of the US justice system. In the face of public condemnation, he argues against the death penalty, a stance that years later leads to his involvement in an exchange of prisoners in East Germany. Steven Spielberg's fact-based Cold War drama, starring Tom Hanks and an Oscar-winning Mark Rylance.

programme.title: Dogtooth
programme.desc: Three siblings have lived their whole lives in a state of isolation in a remote villa, fed false information by their parents to leave them terrified of the outside world. The only outsider allowed in the house is a woman hired to satisfy the son's sexual urges - but when she sleeps with one of the daughters, the parents' control starts to fail. Satirical drama, with Christos Stergioglou and Michele Valley. In Greek.

programme.title: The Heart of Christmas
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman struggling to make time for her children is moved by the story of a boy who was diagnosed with terminal cancer. The youngster's parents had realised that he may not live long enough to see another Christmas, so decided to celebrate the holiday in October. Drama, starring Candace Cameron Bure and Jeanne Neilson, with Christopher and Nicholas Shone doubling up as the youngster.

programme.title: The Christmas Candle
programme.desc: Legend has it that every 25 years an angel visits the English village of Gladbury and bestows a miracle upon whoever lights the Christmas candle. In 1890, progressive pastor David Richmond arrives to take over the local church and his quest to modernise the parish sets him at odds with the residents - especially when the candle goes missing. Festive family drama based on Max Lucado's novel, starring Hans Matheson, Samantha Barks, John Hannah and Susan Boyle.

programme.title: Santa's Boot Camp
programme.desc: The elves go on strike after they find the children becoming too ungrateful, so a desperate Santa brings six unruly teenagers to his boot camp to save Christmas. Festive comedy, starring Eric Roberts, Erika Bierman, Storm Reid, Doug Kaye and Trey Best.

programme.title: Another Christmas Kiss
programme.desc: A woman is attracted to a handsome stranger she meets in a car park, only to discover to her horror that he is her boss's brother. She is reluctant to pursue a relationship due to his bad reputation as a ladies' man, and he tries to convince her he has turned over a new leaf. Romantic drama, starring Elisabeth Harnois and Adam Mayfield.

programme.title: A Golden Christmas
programme.desc: Childhood sweethearts bury a time capsule, with the help of their beloved dog. As adults, they both return to their home town looking for a fresh start and, not recognising one another, fall into an instant mutual dislike. It falls to another dog to remind them of the past and bring them back together. Romantic comedy, with Andrea Roth and Nicholas Brendon.

programme.title: 12 Dog Days Till Christmas
programme.desc: A juvenile delinquent is sent by his probation officer to do community service at an animal shelter just before Christmas. He begrudgingly gets into the spirit of the season as he takes on the challenge of finding new homes for 12 abandoned dogs in time for the big day. Family drama, starring Vincent Giovagnoli and Reginald VelJohnson.

programme.title: Christmas with Tucker
programme.desc: A boy finds solace from his father's recent death through his friendship with a neighbour's dog, and learns to accept responsibility by helping his grandparents and the other members of their farming community to protect their homes from a series of harsh winter storms. Drama, starring James Brolin and Gage Munroe.

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.

programme.title: Christmas with Tucker
programme.desc: A boy finds solace from his father's recent death through his friendship with a neighbour's dog, and learns to accept responsibility by helping his grandparents and the other members of their farming community to protect their homes from a series of harsh winter storms. Drama, starring James Brolin and Gage Munroe.

programme.title: A Doggone Christmas
programme.desc: CIA officers discover a cute orphan puppy with amazing telepathic abilities and plan to turn him into a secret weapon - but the manages to escape a week before Christmas. Family adventure, starring Dominique Swain, Paul Logan and Lauren Parkinson.

programme.title: The 12 Dogs of Christmas
programme.desc: A youngster is sent to live in an isolated town as her father searches for work during the Depression. She's shocked to discover the mayor has banned all dogs - which causes something of a problem when she finds a puppy and instantly falls in love. Festive family drama, starring John Billingsley, Susan Wood and Jordan-Claire Green.

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.

programme.title: The 12 Dogs of Christmas
programme.desc: A youngster is sent to live in an isolated town as her father searches for work during the Depression. She's shocked to discover the mayor has banned all dogs - which causes something of a problem when she finds a puppy and instantly falls in love. Festive family drama, starring John Billingsley, Susan Wood and Jordan-Claire Green.

programme.title: My Christmas Pony
programme.desc: A city girl befriends a special horse during a holiday visit to her family's struggling ranch and decides to enter a local riding contest to save the ranch from closure. Romance, starring Nadine Crocker and Tim Abell.

programme.title: Santa's Dog
programme.desc: A mischievous orphan meets a talking dog just before Christmas. The pooch is working for Santa Claus and has come to offer him a chance to get his name off the naughty list by performing a good deed - namely helping a bitter man regain his Christmas spirit. Children's adventure, with Anthony Robinson and Danny Arroyo.

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.

programme.title: Santa's Dog
programme.desc: A mischievous orphan meets a talking dog just before Christmas. The pooch is working for Santa Claus and has come to offer him a chance to get his name off the naughty list by performing a good deed - namely helping a bitter man regain his Christmas spirit. Children's adventure, with Anthony Robinson and Danny Arroyo.

programme.title: A Dog's Tale at Christmas
programme.desc: A well-meaning genie completely misunderstands a youngster's wish for a canine companion, and innocently transforms him into a dog. Family adventure, starring Gordon Jump, Clayton Taylor and David Bowe.

programme.title: His and Her Christmas
programme.desc: A bitter rivalry erupts between a columnist for a local newspaper and a writer for a much larger publication - but after their newspapers are merged, they become colleagues and their enmity turns into an unexpected romance over the festive season. Romantic comedy, starring Dina Meyer, David Sutcliffe and April Telek.

programme.title: Wish For Christmas
programme.desc: A teenager resents having to go to church on Christmas Eve instead of a festive dance, and wishes that her parents would lose their faith. Her wish is granted, but she is not prepared for the ways in which it changes their personalities. Family drama, starring Anna Frick, Joey Lawrence and Leigh-Allyn Baker.

programme.title: Secret Santa
programme.desc: A 10-year-old orphan is sent to live with his aunt after the deaths of his parents, and befriends an old man. He starts to believe his new friend is really Santa Claus, but his new guardian worries that the seemingly kindly stranger is a conman taking advantage of the youngster's faith. Family drama, starring Sherilyn Fenn, Hume Cronyn and Rory Culkin.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.sub-title: Little House in the Big Woods
programme.desc: Part one of three. Charles Ingalls decides to uproot his wife and daughters from their Wisconsin home to claim a new parcel of land in Kansas. Adaptation of Laura Ingalls Wilder's autobiographical books about her family, starring Kyle Chavarria, Cameron Bancroft and Erin Cottrell.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Native Americans approach the house while Charles is away, terrifying Laura and Mary, while Caroline is delighted to meet new neighbours Mr and Mrs Scott. Fire threatens the Ingalls' home and Charles has difficulty bartering. Adaptation of Laura Ingalls Wilder's autobiographical books, starring Kyle Chavarria, Cameron Bancroft and Erin Cottrell.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Charles is attacked by a mountain lion, while the growing number of Native Americans establishing camps nearby has the family feeling threatened. Conclusion of the three-part adaptation of Laura Ingalls Wilder's autobiographical books about her family starting a new life in Kansas. Starring Kyle Chavarria, Cameron Bancroft and Erin Cottrell.

programme.title: The Edge of the Garden
programme.desc: A newly single man moves into an abandoned house in the country, where he starts to communicate with a woman who lived there 50 years ago and died in mysterious circumstances. Drama, starring Rob Estes.

programme.title: A Woman of Substance
programme.desc: Drama based on the bestselling novel by Barbara Taylor Bradford following the journey of a Yorkshire kitchen maid to being one of the richest women in the world. Starring Jenny Seagrove, Barry Bostwick and Deborah Kerr.

programme.title: A Woman of Substance
programme.desc: Emma's father dies while saving Edwin's life, so the maid vows to avenge his death. Drama, starring Deborah Kerr.

programme.title: A Woman of Substance
programme.desc: Following her husband's death, Emma falls in love with an Australian soldier. Meanwhile, the Harte empire continues to expand. Conclusion of the drama, starring Deborah Kerr.

programme.title: Poldark
programme.desc: A former Cornish military captain, now a member of Parliament, is drawn into the war with France while his son falls in with smugglers. Historical drama, based on Winston Graham's novels, starring John Bowe and Mel Martin, and featuring a young Ioan Gruffudd in one of his earliest roles.

programme.title: Nora Roberts' Midnight Bayou
programme.desc: A successful attorney impulsively buys a New Orleans mansion, but soon becomes convinced the house is haunted. As he delves into the plantation's tortured past to discover the origin of the supernatural activity, he discovers a connection between a local woman and events in the house 100 years previously. Romantic drama, starring Jerry O'Connell, Faye Dunaway and Lauren Stamile.

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: Part two of two. Concluding the fantasy drama, starring Alessandro Preziosi, Blanca Suarez, Giusy Buscemi and Lea Bosco.

programme.title: The Heart of Christmas
programme.desc: A successful businesswoman struggling to make time for her children is moved by the story of a boy who was diagnosed with terminal cancer. Drama, starring Candace Cameron Bure and Jeanne Neilson, with Christopher and Nicholas Shone doubling up as the youngster.
